title: Panel, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: dyed and painted on plain weave
dimensions: H x W (selvedge to selvedge): 88.3 x 106.7 cm (34 3/4 in. x 42 in.)
description: Painted hanging picturing Bhima, the central heroic figure, fighting forces of evil which are being directed by winged figures on the left and right. Predominately reds and yellow on white cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, early 20th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: dyed and painted on plain weave. 1974-9-1.
